text: Sabine Deitmer (21 October 1947 – 11 January 2020) was a German crime writer known for her character, Beate Stein. ==Life== Sabine Deitmer was born in Jena in Germany in 1947 and brought up in Düsseldorf before studying literature and languages in Bonn. By, Bye, Bruno was her first published novel which she wrote after travelling to Brighton, Bristol, Berlin and Lake Constance. She lived in the Ruhr.Sabine Deitmer, krimilexikon.de ==Work== * Perfekte Pläne, * Scharfe Stiche, 2004, * Die schönsten Männer der Stadt, 1997, * NeonNächte, 1995, * Dominante Damen (Kriminalroman), 1994, * Kalte Küsse (Kriminalroman), 1993, * Auch brave Mädchen tun's (Mordgeschichten), 1990, * Bye-bye, Bruno. Wie Frauen morden (Kriminalgeschichten), 1988, ==References== == External links == *Sabine Deitmer in: NRW Literatur im Netz Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Jena Category:German women novelists Category:Women mystery writers Category:Writers from Thuringia Category:German crime fiction writers Category:20th-century German novelists Category:20th- century German women writers Category:21st-century German novelists Category:21st-century German women writers
title: Sabine Deitmer
